ABOUT_SUBTITLE: Information about the app & its developers
ADD_NEW_FOLDER_SUBTITLE: Add a new folder to your music library.
AUTOMATICALLY_ADD_OTHER_SONGS_TO_NOW_PLA: Start playing other music from collection after queue completion
AUTO_REFRESH_SETTING: Check for new files on fresh start
BACKGROUND_ARTWORK_SUBTITLE: Show minimal artwork behind content on the screen
CHANGE_NOW_PLAYING_BAR_COLOR_BASED_ON_MU: Change "Now Playing Bar" color based on music
COLLECTION_INDEXING_LABEL:
Your local music is being synced.
It's not a good idea to close the app.
COLLECTION_SEARCH_NO_RESULTS_SUBTITLE: Nothing like that could be found in your collection
COLLECTION_TOP_BODY_ALBUM_EMPTY:
Search & save some music to see it here.
Spin the refresh to see new stuff.
CREATE_PLAYLIST_SUBHEADER: Create a new playlist to add your music
EXIT_SUBTITLE: Do you want to exit Harmonoid?
EXPERIMENTAL_SUBTITLE: These settings are not marked as stable yet
INDEXING_ALREADY_GOING_ON_SUBTITLE: An indexing related operation is already going on. Please wait.
INVALID_PLAYLIST_URL: An invalid playlist URL was provided.
LAST_COLLECTION_DIRECTORY_REMOVED: Atleast one folder needs to stay in your collection.
NO_COLLECTION_SUBTITLE:
No music found.
Change where to look for the music from settings.
NO_PLAYLISTS_FOUND:
No playlists found.
Create some to see them there.
PLAYLISTS_TEXT_FIELD_HINT: Give a name to your new playlist...
PLAYLIST_ADD_DIALOG_BODY: Select a playlist to add this track
PLAYLIST_TRACKS_SUBHEADER: Here are the tracks in this playlist
PLAY_URL_SUBTITLE: Enter URI to the media resource
PROXY_SUBTITLE: Enable proxy for external media resources.
REFRESH_INFORMATION: Just checks for the new added & deleted files to updates the music library (faster)
REFRESH_SUBTITLE: Check for newly added & deleted music files to update the music library.
REINDEX_SUBTITLE: Build the complete music library after clearing current database.
SEARCH_NO_RECENT_SEARCHES: Your recent searches will show here
SELECTED_DIRECTORIES: Here's a list of what we've found so far
SETTING_ACCENT_COLOR_SUBTITLE: Change the accent coloring of the app
SETTING_APP_VERSION_SUBTITLE: Information about current version of the app
SETTING_INDEXING_SUBTITLE: Include more folders in your collection
SETTING_LANGUAGE_PROVIDERS_SUBTITLE: Thanks a lot for your support to the app.
SETTING_LANGUAGE_RESTART_DIALOG_SUBTITLE: Do you want to restart the app now?
SETTING_LANGUAGE_SUBTITLE: Change the language of the app
SETTING_STARGAZERS_SUBTITLE: Thanks a lot for your support
SETTING_THEME_SUBTITLE: Change the app to light or dark mode
SHOW_NOW_PLAYING_AFTER_PLAYING: Jump to Now Playing Screen on play
SHOW_NOW_PLAYING_AFTER_PLAYING_SUBTITLE: Show "Now Playing Screen" after a track is selected for playing
SHOW_TRACK_PROGRESS_ON_TASKBAR_SUBTITLE: Show track playback percentage on taskbar app icon
STATS_SUBTITLE: Statistical details about your music library
USE_MODERN_NOW_PLAYING_SCREEN: Use modern "Now Playing Screen" with dynamic backgrounds & time-synced lyrics
USE_THESE_CHARACTERS_TO_SEPARATE_ARTISTS: Use ; // / \\ or \ to separate multiple artists.
VISUALS: Add or remove visuals visible during music playback
WEB_INTERNET_ERROR: Let's play your local music, while you get back online.
WEB_NO_RESULTS: Nothing like that could be found
WEB_WELCOME: Search for music or give a link
WEB_WELCOME_SUBTITLE: Suggestions will appear here based on what you listen.
